snippet: GARELIK--Allen Y. Devoted and loving nephew/ cousin. Allen's kind, caring, gentle and generous manner set an example for all. His love for family was limitless and a blessing to five Garelik generations. May his wonderful memory provide comfort and serve as an inspiration. Our heart extends to Lea, Shelia, Michael and Jenny for the loss of their great son, husband, father and grandfather. Neal Garelik 1/3
